page.title: 10EASTRIGGS SHOPPING
page.content:
635 questionnaires distributed, 1 to each Eastriggs house. 130 returned, about 1 in 5. Village totals may be estimated by multiplying sample totals by 5.
FOOD There are 3 food shops in Eastriggs. People were asked where they buy most of their food. Some families buy in two places. 58 families buy a lot of their food in Eastriggs; 56 in Annan; 11 in Dum fries; 42 in Carlisle; 1 in Lockerbie; and 1 in Edinburgh. CLOTHES _ no Eastriggs clothes shops. Some families buy in 2 places. 17 families buy many of their clothes in Annan; 23 in Dumfries; 80 in Carlisle; 4 in Gretna; 2 in Edinburgh; 1 in Newcastle; 6 from mail order firms; 33 make their own
